name: Line Track
description:
How To Play :

Drag to connect matching caps with pipe. If any pipes cross,
they will break!. Pair all caps, and cover the entire board
with pipe to solve each puzzle.

DISCLAIMER :
This game is cloning of "Flow Free" with modifications
which is created for study purpose.
There are some bugs,  so game cannot work

In Developing Progress

regards from Civitas Amikom (Rayhan Dwi Fajar)
